public abstract class ChecksAdapter extends Object implements iChecks
* @author Juan Arias * @author Steven AragÃ³n * @version 1.0* Abstract adapter class implementing the Sudoku game validation logic. Provides base functionality for checking Sudoku rules and managing game state.

  • Method Details

    • setCounter

      public void setCounter()
      Increments the move counter by one. Called after each successful valid move.
      Specified by:
      setCounter in interface iChecks

    • smallBlocksChecks

      public boolean smallBlocksChecks(int row, int col, String number)
      Validates if a number can be placed in its 2x3 sub-block without duplicates.
      Specified by:
      smallBlocksChecks in interface iChecks
      Parameters:
      row - The row index (0-5) of the cell being checked
      col - The column index (0-5) of the cell being checked
      number - The candidate number as String (1-6)
      Returns:
      true if valid placement, false if duplicate exists in sub-block

    • horizontalChecks

      public boolean horizontalChecks(int row, int col, String number)
      Validates if a number can be placed in its row without duplicates.
      Specified by:
      horizontalChecks in interface iChecks
      Parameters:
      row - The row index (0-5) to validate
      col - The column index (0-5) being checked (excluded from validation)
      number - The candidate number as String (1-6)
      Returns:
      true if valid placement, false if duplicate exists in row

    • verticalChecks

      public boolean verticalChecks(int row, int col, String number)
      Validates if a number can be placed in its column without duplicates.
      Specified by:
      verticalChecks in interface iChecks
      Parameters:
      row - The row index (0-5) being checked (excluded from validation)
      col - The column index (0-5) to validate
      number - The candidate number as String (1-6)
      Returns:
      true if valid placement, false if duplicate exists in column

    • allChecks

      public boolean allChecks(int row, int col, String number)
      Performs comprehensive validation (sub-block, row, and column checks).
      Specified by:
      allChecks in interface iChecks
      Parameters:
      row - The row index (0-5) of the cell
      col - The column index (0-5) of the cell
      number - The candidate number as String (1-6)
      Returns:
      true only if all validation checks pass

    • isGameOver

      public String isGameOver()
      Determines if the game has been won (all cells filled).
      Specified by:
      isGameOver in interface iChecks
      Returns:
      Victory message if counter reaches 36 (6x6 grid), otherwise returns current error message
